thread.title: Ground News - Man charged in Christmas Day joyride through Vadnais Heights motorsports dealership
thread.title_full: Ground News - Man charged in Christmas Day joyride through Vadnais Heights motorsports dealership

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Man charged in Christmas Day joyride through Vadnais Heights motorsports dealership
text:
Summary by Ground News Authorities charged Austin Erickson, 30, with second degree burglary and property damage. Erickson said he contacted a high school friend and met them at Tousley Motorsports. He was also charged in three separate incidents in Ramsey County this February. A hearing for those three incidents is scheduled for Jan. 19. Share menu More

Star Tribune Lean Left High Factuality Individual: Glen Taylor Man charged in Christmas Day joyride through Vadnais Heights motorsports dealership Tousley Motorsports said the man caused more than $150,000 in damages to to the building and its merchandise.
